description: Crawley Road Open Studios, Tottenham Boutique and Makers Market and Turning Earth Ceramics Market, gourmet street food led by resident chefs Bolland and Crust, art exhibition and a wide range of making demonstrations and family activities.

events.name: Drop in
events.notes: A free drop in flower crown making stall with renowned florist Shilpa Reddy using surplus fresh flowers from the wedding season.

factsheet.heading: Our Story
paragraphs: Established in 2020 Crawley Road Studios have turned a previously derelict light industrial site into a thriving community of small businesses and creative studios.  Community is at the heart of our ethos and we continuing to grow and reach out to local people and visitors from further afield.

images.title: Turning Earth N22 open access ceramics at Crawley Road Studios

location.address: Crawley Road Studios, 38 Crawley Road, N22 6QS
travel_info: Additional travel info: A 10 minute walk from Turnpike Lane.  Easy cycle from Seven Sisters, Wood Green, Tottenham, Walthamstow, Crouch End.  We are at a dead end, when walking from Lordship Rec, head up Rusper or Sandringham Road and turn onto Boundary Road.  We are in an LTN, vehicular access only from Westbury Ave/Lordship Lane.  No cars on site, free parking in the Belmont parking zone at weekends.

name: Crawley Road Studios
